reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Iraq Delegation(2020 Unaudited)

description.narrative: In Iraq, the ICRC helps displaced people, refugees, and civilians in places affected by fighting. Here's the latest news coming out of the regionIn Iraq, the ICRC helps displaced people, refugees and civilians in places affected by fighting during the times of crisis. We improve access to clean water and health care, visit detainees and enable them to maintain contact with their families and support the authorities’ efforts to clarify the fate of people missing from earlier conflicts. Refugees and displaced people in IraqIraqi womenIran-Iraq war

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
